column1: Smoque BBQ////The food was very good.  We had a sampling of almost everything.  My favorite was the Brisket.  Yummy! I loved the sauce that it came with too.  The pulled pork was also delicious and my boyfriend loved the Baby Back Ribs.  As for the sides
column2: we went classic fries and mac & cheese.  Very good!   We will definitely be back!
